forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens to a gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies. The cool air, holding a whisper of the night’s chill, settles around 45 degrees, nudged by a subtle breeze from the north-northeast. The early hours offer an ethereal clarity to the landscape, with the Golden Gate Bridge standing resiliently in the distance, hinting at the adventures that await as the sun begins to rise higher.

By midday, the sun will stretch its arms over the city, promising a warm flush as temperatures rise to around 60 degrees before gently retreating to a more subdued 56 in the afternoon. The streets will be illuminated with mostly sunny hues, but watch for the telltale signs of the marine layer; the elusive fog may still weave its way through lower elevations, possibly cloaking the bay with a soft veil at times. Dressing in layers will serve you well—an inviting sweater complemented by a light jacket will keep you comfortable from the brisk morning air to the gentle warmth of afternoon sunlight. 

Given this delightful mix of inviting weather, an afternoon stroll along the waterfront could be an exquisite choice. A visit to a local café for a warm drink, followed by a leisurely walk through the Embarcadero, allows one to soak in the sights and sounds of a waking city. Whether you find yourself drawn to the water’s edge or the charm of local shops, today holds the promise of simple pleasures, framed beautifully by the unique San Francisco skyline.
